Necromancer/Hell Drak

	Necromancer and Hell Drak had been wondering around for quite a while now.
 They were sent to Earth to aid a peace keeping faction, the Maximals. 
They hadn't found any bots at all.  Necromancer stopped and looked over at
Hell Drak.

	"My scanners are detecting two Maximals named Dinobot and Tavatron
nearby," Necromancer said to Hell Drak.

	Hell Drak looked at Necromancer, "Well, what are you waiting for brother? 
Let's go check it out!!!" Hell Drak said and ran off towards Dinobot and
Tavatron's location.

	"Hey!  Wait up sister!!" Necromancer shouted as he ran to catch up with
her.

	Necromancer and Hell Drak reached a beautiful place after running a bit.

	"It's a paradise, brother!" Hell Drak said as she gazed around.

	"Yes, sister, it is indeed a paradise.  I'd hate to think what would
happen if Predacons found this place," Necromancer said, also staring
around in awe.

	Suddenly, Necromancer and Hell Drak's attention was caught by two bots.  

	"My scanners show that these are the two Maximals we were looking for
while we came here," Hell Drak said to Necromancer quietly.  Hell Drak and
Necromancer walked over to Dinobot and Tavatron.  Necromancer stepped up
and spoke.

	"Don't pull out your weapons, we are not hostile bots.  My name is
Necromancer and this is my sister--" Necromancer was interrupted by Hell
Drak.

	"The name's Hell Drak," She said.

	Necromancer continued, "Anyway, we were sent to Earth to help you and the
other Maximals.  Our scanners detected you two nearby so we decided to come
and meet you.  The scanners tell us that you are Dinobot and you are
Tavatron, am I correct?" Necromancer said, hoping that he and his sister
could gain their trust.
